com.ibm.jaggr.service.impl.config

Class BundleVersionsHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.jaggr.service.util.BundleVersionsHashBase
      • com.ibm.jaggr.service.impl.config.BundleVersionsHash
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.ibm.jaggr.core.config.IConfigScopeModifier, com.ibm.jaggr.core.IExtensionInitializer

    public class BundleVersionsHash
extends BundleVersionsHashBase
implements com.ibm.jaggr.core.IExtensionInitializer, com.ibm.jaggr.core.config.IConfigScopeModifier
    An implementation of IConfigScopeModifier that provides a JavaScript function which will return a hash of the aggregated Bundle-Version header values for the list of bundles specified in the function arguments. If the first argument to the function is an array of strings, then the first argument specifies the names of the bundle headers that should be included in the hash, followed by the bundle names.

    Syntax is : 

          getBundleVersionsHash('com.acme.bundle1', 'com.acme.bundle2', ...);
    or 
          getBundleVersionsHash(['Bundle-Version', 'Bnd-LastModified'], 'com.acme.bundle1', 'com.acme.bundle2', ...);
    The result of this function may be assigned to the cacheBust config property so that any change in any of the values of these headers for any of the specified bundles will result in a changed cacheBust value.

    An alternative name for the function may be specified by the propName init-param in the plugin extension xml.
